exists.description: Whether user exists in local database

userId.description: External user ID from User Microservice

isFieldWorker.description: Whether the user is a field worker

departmentId.description: Department ID the user belongs to

lastSyncedAt.description: Last sync timestamp with external service

department.description: Department information if user is assigned to one

isFieldWorker.description: Whether the user is a field worker (affects attendance rules)

departmentId.description: Department ID the user belongs to

name.description: Department name (must be unique within the business)

kahaId.description: Unique identifier for the business location (must be unique across all entities)

address.description: Physical address of the business location

radiusMeters.description: Allowed check-in radius in meters (minimum 10m, maximum 1000m)

avatarUrl.description: URL to the entity avatar image

coverImageUrl.description: URL to the entity cover image
